name: Bubble Up (Dortiz)
description:
My submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Hope you enjoy!

Instructions:

Join good bubbles together, while keeping bad bubbles from joining to other bubbles. Good bubbles give you points, while bad bubbles take away points. See how high you can score in 1 minute!

Credits:

  • Music: https://opengameart.org/content/next-to-you
  • Font: https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/pixel-operator
  • Palette: https://coolors.co/
  • Some platormer code: https://github.com/Brackeys/2D-Character-Controller/blob/master/CharacterController2D.cs
  • See attached Sources.pdf for more specifics
